content_fields.desc: **Required.** A unique identifier for the call.
content_fields.title: string

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The version of the VoIP specification this message adheres to. This specification is version 0.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The time in milliseconds that the invite is valid for. Once the invite age exceeds this value, clients should discard it. They should also no longer show the call as awaiting an answer in the UI.
content_fields.title: integer

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The type of session description. Must be 'offer'.
content_fields.title: enum

content_fields.desc: **Required.** The SDP text of the session description.
content_fields.title: string

desc: This event is sent by the caller when they wish to establish a call.
